mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_data_blood_oxygen ( bloodOxygenID , associateID , measureTime , SPO2 , PR , upload , RES1 , RES2 , creatTime , describtion , deleteFlag ) VALUES ( #{bloodOxygenID} , #{associateID} , #{measureTime} , #{sPO2} , #{pR} , #{upload} , #{rES1} , #{rES2} , #{creatTime} , #{describtion} , #{deleteFlag} )
